articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: Gautam Gambhir lashes out at Babar Azam's captaincy after Pakistan's Super 4 loss against Sri Lanka - Cricket Times
articles.description: Gautam Gambhir criticised Babar Azam's captaincy after Pakistan's loss to Sri Lanka in the Super 4 match of the Asia cup 2023. Pakistan have been eliminated from the tournament after Sri Lanka defeated them by two-wickets.
